scripts.start: concurrently "cd userservices && npm start" "cd authservices && npm start" "cd adminservices && npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd userservices && npm i" "cd authservices && npm i" "cd adminservices && npm i"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd userservices && npm run build " "cd authservices && npm run build" "cd adminservices && npm run build"
